title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.23 - Parties to food facility lease
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.23 - Parties to food facility lease

State Regulations

The parties to any leasing agreement for the food
facility located on the premises or serving the premises where bingo is
conducted must be the licensed commercial lessor and the operator of the food
facility. All such leases must be approved by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4822.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
